The sandwiches such as the chopped cheese, lamb cheesesteak, and gyro was good. The tostones need seasoning with pink sauce, curly was well seasoning and delicious. The turkey bacon double cheeseburger was good. The pizza roll is terrible it is crap wrapped in egg roll shell. I rather get some real pizza rolls in a pizzeria than eating that garbage again. The service was okay however, when I tell the Muslim brother that rum raisin ice cream is haram because of the rum he acted all nonchalant about it. This is a halal restaurant no alcohol in all forms should not be allowed. Astaghfirullah to brother. The atmosphere was small people coming in and out there is no room to dine and enjoy the food so I glad I ordered to go.
the best , very friendly
The food is very good.  And the customer service is great.

Definitely not a 4.9 star place. Chicken over rice i ordered was not fresh. No salt, no seasoning, absolutely no taste. Plus not fresh. I will never ever come here.

This review is not meant to disparage the quality of this establishment and their staff.  The uber eats listings need to be more descriptive. I regularly have ordered chicken breast in their ‚Äúmixed chicken‚Äù option for 4.99 and did an add on piece for 1.99, only to find my order was upcharged 3 dollars because I wanted specifically breasts. The uber eats listing does not let you specify chicken or list individual prices of each piece, and only lets you type it via description. Amazing food, we have been a long time customer,  this review is so their online listings can more accurately reflect their prices.

Update: received order and i did not get what I even requested and agreed to over the phone in order to drop the charge. Instead of 1 breast and 2 wings I received 1 thigh and 2 wings.

Further update. This order was actually correct and i apologize for my error in what i saw. I should have checked more thoroughly. I thought it was a thigh. üôèüèΩ

I mean the prices are good but the food quality its not good. Its not made in a helathy way plus the taste is the dullest i have ever tasted.

They have a big selection with fair prices and the employees are respectful / hard working. Been coming here since it first opened. Great food, great service. Their food is prepared hot, and they do so promptly. They have a wider selection of food compared to other fast food places in the area, too. I'm a regular here, and I'd recommend it.

I dont give bad review usually but the fried chicken was stinks , it was old probably, I dont like wasting food , so I did ate yesterday but now my stomach hurt. Try to have some better quality food. Im not coming back . Sorry I just went there just because rating was good .

The food in Amazing Chicken & Gyro is a great price and tastes great especially for the price. They are fully halal which is amazing and allows for everyone to enjoy along with the full range of a menu catering to everyone. I would recommend especially the chicken wings with mango habanero and the Gyro Salad with white sauce!

I had a wonderful experience with this amazing Restaurant today had Chicken over Rice it tasted delicious and crispy and the most important and beautiful part is that the front desk guy is very good person I loved being here and continue to be‚Ä¶..

Empty plate says it all! Residents of Norwood and Jerome, this is a gem! Great customer service, great food, great price. From the cook on the fries to the flavor of the gyro, everything was spot on. Please check this place out!
My son and I order the French fries with 2 piece chicken. The fries were crispy just how I like it and the chicken was crispy with a lot of flavor. I also had the milkshake. This was Amazing ü§©.
Delicious food, clean establishment, great service, options for days.
Excellent service with an extensive list of food options. 10/10 recommend for a quick quality bite!
Best Halal chicken over rice Platter ever I had. Good food reasonable price, best service. 100% recommended Halal over rice.
They have very friendly servers! Tasty food and great service! Always happy to order from here
Burger is Amazing. Fresh good, clean place, staff is friendly. Good place to eat.
Amazing Rice and salad. I love that place. Definitely recommend
The food was good, staff was great especially the over night shift, they accommodate whatever you want they‚Äôll make it. Been there a few times tried different things didn‚Äôt disappoint

This is my go to place when it comes to Halal food. I believe they have the best halal food and service in the area, and I strongly recommend it. My favorite plate is the amazing plater which is a combination of rice, salad, fried, pita bread, lamb and chicken for about 14 bucks. They make the portion of each plater worth the amount spend. And, you can tell they care about customers experience by the way they take care of the line during busy times all in maintaining a top notch quality service. Going there is refreshing as it is always guaranteed that you will be served fresh food.
Food is very good and always fresh. Service is always on point since they are always attentive and try to get your order as soon as possible. The atmosphere is average, like any food place.

I absolutely love Amazing Chicken & Gyro! The platters, featuring a delightful combination of succulent chicken and savory lamb over rice, are consistently delicious. The flavors are perfectly balanced, and the generous portions leave me satisfied every time. The quality of ingredients and the friendly service make it a go-to spot for a hearty and flavorful meal. Highly recommended!

I'm too lazy to put review otherwise but I had a great experience at this place. Love the food and especially the guy at front was very nice and helpful with lovely smile. If you are looking for a place to eat must recommended where you‚Ä¶

Amazing place, and really respectful workers that give you best experience and the food enlightens you to another realm. The food where it takes you back to the memories with your childhood. The workers intrigues me with their social ability to speak to anyone it‚Äôs like getting a 2 in 1 food service and therapy service

Just ordered on Uber eats they have a buy one get one free promotion for chicken and waffles. I ordered tenders with waffles and I was not credited for two orders. Buy one get one free so I had to cancel it so I can get my buy one get one free from Uber. When I went to cancel and they kept $27.60 letting me re-order any food. I would not order from here if I was any of y‚Äôall in I don‚Äôt answer the phones.
Very fresh food every time i go there. I‚Äôve gone at least 5-6 times already. Each time i go everything is freshly made unlike other kennedys or fried chicken spots.
Always good food and great service. I come here at least twice a week.
Great experience. The food is the best chicken spot food I‚Äôve had. Another plus is that I can sit down and eat in a clean environment. 5 Stars for sure.
I must say have wide variety of food and I love the food. Quality and quantity is worth of every penny. I will highly recommend this place. Especially I love their Gyro and Loaded fries.
